message: Looking for the best im app
I'm currently trying IMO, it's free, feature rich, and there is an iPhone and iPad version. I'm impressed so far.
I've used Meebo in the past. It's decent and free, but a little flakey.
@justinluey great recommendation, as always. Thank you.
I've used beejives for 3yrs now.   Works good.   Supports backgrounding and sending messages if you close the app before the message is sent.   It's worth every penny
Do you recommend the iPad version of beejive? I bought the iPhone version and have loved it for 3 years. But the iPad version is a separate purchase :(
